message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm asking for $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $170. I believe this product will be very beneficial for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $140?
